channel.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Everyone can now draw in their deathnote. * Spy/Cult Maid no longer counts as a visit. * Disabled the early game over checks for the time being. (Games would end when they shouldn't, even when things like DK's and abilities were accounted for.)
## QoL: * Private Notes background updated. * Private Notes are now draggable.
## Assassin: * Distract now usable during trials.
## Enforcer: * Removed Armored passive, since Protection was changed. * Protection now prevents visits to targeted Unseen member.
## Herbalist: * Defile now lets you know the class of the player you defile.
## King: * Removed Allies from starting King. * Added Night Ability Order to starting King - Prevent a player from voting tomorrow. 4 uses. * Abilities no longer count as visiting. * Starting King now has 6 uses of Guards!
## Knight: * Changed Sacrifice icon.
## Mastermind: * Into the Shadows now hides the Mastermind's occupy immunity again.
## Paladin: * Smite will now affect the Paladin in addition to his target.
## Psycho King: * Now permanently death immune at night. * Abilities no longer count as visiting.
## Ritualist: * Tornado reduced to two uses. * Brotherhood changed to single target, uses increased to three.
## Sheriff: * Now always spawns in Unseen games, and is now unique and unconvertable. * New night ability Surveillance - Prevent visitors and learn the name of those that try. You will be alerted if an Unseen member tries. 3 uses.
## Sorcerer: * Magic Dust uses reduced to 2. * Circle of Death uses reduced to 2. * New Day Ability Magic Cloak - Hides your visits at night. 2 uses.
## Bug Fixes: * Fixed the in-game tutorial * Fixed a bug with some abilities not being usable during trials. * No longer shows multiple healing messages to those being healed. All healers should still know if someone needed healing. * Fixed a bug where sometimes people wouldn't show up as visiting. The only abilities or classes that shouldn't show up as visiting will say so in the class card. * Some others.

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes

Wait, six guards???

I’m not sure that’s a good idea…

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
TinyDeer:

This is a good thing imo. But yes, people need to actually read them haha. Not that the game should be balanced around player laziness

I don’t mean it as a bad thing, it made the game way more fun for me! It’s just annoying when people decide not to use them

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: TinyDeer
item.description:
Navi:

Reading logs is now even more important than it used to be,

This is a good thing imo. But yes, people need to actually read them haha. Not that the game should be balanced around player laziness

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Little bit of feedback from my experience so far: Reading logs is now even more important than it used to be, since there’s a reduced number of classes that can give definite sus/non-sus results, so deductions from logs is the best way to get info. Only problems are that a lot of people still don’t read logs, and some people write terrible logs

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: TinyDeer
item.description:
Bart_Auringer:

Just last night a Reaper who should have won lost because he couldn’t chill anyone before we voted him up. It was 2v1 and he played a good game and got robbed.

Yes, it would be nice if you couldn’t vote for the first 5 seconds of the day or something.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Sad to see no grace period at the beginning of the day for Noble abilities and Reaper Chill before people can vote.

Just last night a Reaper who should have won lost because he couldn’t chill anyone before we voted him up. It was 2v1 and he played a good game and got robbed.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It won’t The ability means that as far as everyone else’s ability’s are concerned (other than one’s that punish the user biased on faction) the MM is an Observer.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Just wondering, how does the Mastermind’s appearance as not Unseen for three days interact with the Sheriff’s new Surveillance ability? Will the MM show as Unseen or not?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito

Because that’s OP

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
That’s better than 10, but why does it even need to be temporary? If it’s made to last the rest of the day then players wouldn’t be as likely to exe players that say nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
10 seconds is not good enough but forever is too good… How about 25 seconds?

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
TinyDeer:

I disagree. The Reaper’s Chill ability requires a cost because it’s very strong. The person is unable to influence the flow of the day or defend themselves. The Assassin shouldn’t get to do it for free. As of this change, the Assassin will be able to cause just enough confusion to get an inno executed. It requires more skill than Chill.

10 seconds is useless though. And it only has 2 uses anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: TinyDeer
item.description:
Thank you for listening to us. You are the best!

Ellie:

Defile now lets you know the class of the player you defile.

Ellie:

Removed Allies from starting King.
Added Night Ability Order to starting King - Prevent a player from voting tomorrow. 4 uses.
Abilities no longer count as visiting.
Starting King now has 6 uses of Guards!

I still think the King is dangerously underpowered with this change - what incentive do I have to coordinate with the King at the beginning? It also remains to be seen whether BD will just exe king at first opportunity. I’m willing to see what happens though!

Cuatrolan:

You reverted all the problematic changes and left the good ones. Impressive. Thanks a lot!

Agreed! Once again, I’m extremely pleased and impressed with the respect for the community from the devs.

Ellie:

Now always spawns in Unseen games, and is now unique and unconvertable.
New night ability Surveillance - Prevent visitors and learn the name of those that try. You will be alerted if an Unseen member tries. 3 uses.

Very interesting change. I’m willing to give it a shot. RIP my sweet, sweet fake Sheriff logs.

Yattien:

Yeah! This is more like it, more focused on balancing rather than out-right change. King is still useless in my opinion, Allies needs replaced with something a little more powerful than the late game Noble power but we’re getting there.

Agreed. But this is a far, far, far better patch than the previous draft.

Yattien:

I do like the Paladin change to Smite.

Agreed, Paladin needed a buff and this is only logical.

RHCube:

[re: Distract] This is a start, but it’s still underpowered. It should last the entire day.

I disagree. The Reaper’s Chill ability requires a cost because it’s very strong. The person is unable to influence the flow of the day or defend themselves. The Assassin shouldn’t get to do it for free. As of this change, the Assassin will be able to cause just enough confusion to get an inno executed. It requires more skill than Chill.

Lower need for skilled use --> High cost (2 souls)
Higher need for skilled use --> Low cost (Free)

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.16 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Not always. And that doesn’t make them fair. There’s no way to counter or trick smite or scout. Scout’s only weakness was that it was easy to fakeclaim, but now sheriff will rarely be fakeclaimed. And smite doesn’t even need to be fakeclaimed.

Read full topic

item.description:
Once the Unseen/Cult die you win. And it’s fine to have Ability’s that effect one class if the class is guarenteed to be there.

Read full topic
